entry.title: Monday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries overnight. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries changing to a few rain showers in the morning. Risk of thunderstorms in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries in the evening and ending overnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
